All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Collectable
    A QR code scanned alongside an optional photo and location.
    CollectableDatabase
    A database of all Collectables stored by all users.
    CreateAccount
    Fragment that facilitates creating a new account on the MainActivity.
    Geolocation
    The Geolocation is a class that represents a latitude and longitude for QR codes and the player.
    HomeActivity
    The HomeActivity is the primary activity after the user has logged in, and allows the user to view their profile, the QR Map, and the scoreboard..
    LoginWithQRFragment
    Fragment for logging in with the QR Code on the UserActivity.
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity facilitates logging into the game, or creating an account if the user doesn't have one, and passing that information to the HomeActivity
    MyCollectiblesList
    Displays all of the collectibles the user has claimed
    Owner
    Owner class that is able to delete players/collectables.
    OwnerActivity
    Activity for OWNERS ONLY.
    Player
    Player class for all players of the game.
    PlayerCollectiblesFragment
    A fragment to pop up on click of a player in the SearchMenuActivity
    PlayerDatabse
    A database of all Players.
    PlayersList
    Custom array adapter for the SearchMenuActivity to display players.
    PrefMenu
    A popup menu which allows owners to tap to change settings.
    QRMapActivity
    The QRMapActivity shows the user a map centered at their current location, and highlights nearby QR Codes.
    QRViewActivity
    Class for the QR view activity to view a collectable's comments and players.
    ScoringSystem
    This class is the implementation of the proposed scoring system as laid out by the project problem description.
    SearchMenuActivity
    Activity to search and view other players and their collectibles.
    UserActivity
    The UserActivity shows the player's current QR Codes that they've scanned, and their login code.
    UserScannedAdapter
    Adapter to show QR codes scanned by the player in the UserActivity.
